results.name: default/wordpress-79f8d974db-ctng7

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-79f8d974db-ctng7], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-79f8d974db-ctng7' is not ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs wordpress-79f8d974db-ctng7`. 3. Verify readiness probe settings. 4. Ensure necessary resources are available. 5. Restart pod if needed.
